tool_description: An API that retrieves the highest grossing movies, of all time.
title: Highest Grossing Movies

api_list.name: Get Top 100 Highest Grossing Movies by MPAA Rating
api_list.description: Returns the (at most) 100 highest grossing movies by MPAA rating.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://highest-grossing-movies.p.rapidapi.com/movies/mpaa-rating/{rating}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "highest-grossing-movies.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Top 100 Highest Grossing Movies by Genre
api_list.description: Returns the (at most) 100 highest grossing movies by genre

api_list.name: Get Certain 100 Range of Highest Grossing Movies
api_list.description: Returns highest grossing movies ranked 1-100, or 101-200, ect.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://highest-grossing-movies.p.rapidapi.com/movies/100range/{range}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "highest-grossing-movies.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Top 2000 Highest Grossing Movies
api_list.description: This will return the top 2000 highest grossing movies worldwide, of all time.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://highest-grossing-movies.p.rapidapi.com/movies"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "highest-grossing-movies.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
